heading: Apply to Become a Marpple Partner

hgroup.heading:
Before Applying to Be a Partner,
Please Read Carefully!

section1.p1:
The application for entering is reviewed jointly with (주) 마플 코퍼레이션 (Marpple, Marpple Shop, Marpple Shop Plus).
To protect the rights of the applicant, please exclude detailed descriptions of technologies or designs that have not been patented, except for detailed descriptions.

fieldset1.legend: What Type of Partner Do You Want to Apply As?

fieldset2.legend: Please Fill in the Entry Application Details.

title.label: Entry Application Title
title.error_required: Please enter the entry application title

content.label: Entry Application Details
content.placeholder:
Please provide specific details.
1. Background of entry application
2. Specific details
3. Expected effects of entry

error.required: Please enter the entry application details.
error.type: Please enter the entry application details in text.

proposal.label: Entry Proposal
proposal.placeholder:
Attachment files are in PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX,
HWP, GUL, GIF, JPG, PNG, ZIP, TXT format/
100MB or less

error.type: Please enter the entry proposal as a file.

fieldset4.legend:
Introduce Your Company.
The More Details, the Better!

error.type: Please enter the company type in text.
Please enter the company name in text.

profile.label: Company Introduction
profile.placeholder:
Attachment files are in PDF, DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX,
HWP, GUL, GIF, JPG, PNG, ZIP, TXT format/
100MB or less

error.type: Applicant's name should be in text.

email.label: Applicant's Email
email.placeholder: Please enter the company email address

error.required: Please enter the applicant's email address.

phone.label: Applicant's Contact Number
